title: what are props ?
description: Props are custom attributes that you can register on a component. They allow you to pass data from a parent component to a child component. This communication between components enables building modular and reusable code.

children.value: Vue.js, a progressive JavaScript framework, provides a powerful and flexible way to build interactive web applications. One of its key features is the use of props, short for properties, to pass data from a parent component to a child component. Let's delve into the world of Vue.js props and explore how they work.

Props are custom attributes that you can register on a component. They allow you to pass data from a parent component to a child component. This communication between components enables building modular and reusable code.
